channel.title: Softlayer_network_storage_hub_cleversafe_account on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_network_storage_hub_cleversafe_account on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Hub_Cleversafe_Account
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Hub_Cleversafe_Account Service Datatype Description This class provides an interface for the management of IBM Cloud Object Storage Accounts and Credentials. Methods credentialCreate credentialDelete getAccount Retrieve softLayer account to which an IBM Cloud Object Storage account belongs to. getAllObjects getBillingItem Retrieve an associated parent billing item which is active. Includes billing items which are scheduled to be cancelled in the future.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Hub_Cleversafe_Account
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Hub_Cleversafe_Account Service Datatype Description Local accountId The ID of the SoftLayer_Account which this IBM Cloud Object Storage account is associated with. Type: integer id The IMS ID of an IBM Cloud Object Storage account. Type: integer notes A user-defined field of notes. Type: string username Human readable identifier of IBM Cloud Object Storage accounts.
